exact_quotes: The module performs live transcription but requires improvements to reduce latency, save interview recordings and transcripts, enable playback, and generate detailed interview reports.
You'll also be responsible for fixing existing bugs to ensure a stable, production-ready release.
pain_points: High transcription latency affecting user experience
Missing recording and transcript storage functionality
No playback capability in current implementation
Need for structured interview report generation

vague_requirements.clarification: What specific data points and format? (timestamps, insights, sentiment, export format)
Current baseline and target latency not specified
Bug inventory not provided, discovery work expected
